name: Clean'em Up VR Game
description:
Clean'em Up is a top down VR Strategy Game where you have to make sure you don't run out of space. You have different files regularly filling space of your storage. 

Different file types:

  •  MP3 
  • MP4
  • DOC
  • JPG

You have tools that you can use to avoid running out of space. 

Different Tools:

  • Defragmenter
  • Compressor
  • Cloudy
  • Antivirus

Every now and then Viruses will enter your system which will become obstacles and kill your tools. Use antivirus to fight them and make sure your file management is in place.

Steps to complete the levels:

  1. Use Defragmenter to sort your files in folders
  2. Use Compressor to zip the folders
  3. Use cloudy to upload the zipped folders
  4. Use antivirus to repair firewall and fight viruses.
  5. Tools panel will not work when it is turned Red

Cooldown for Tools Spawn:
Antivirus: 0.2 seconds
Defragmenter: 2 seconds
Compressor: 5 seconds
Cloudy: 10 seconds

Win / Lose Condition:
Space full = Game Over.
60% Space Available = Level Complete.
